channel.title: Religious Presentation
channel.description:
I need to do a presentation on something which has ethical/moral issues and can be linked with religion. Can't just talk about a specific religion, and can't talk about something unrelated such as the ethics of social networking.
Any ideas?

item.title: Religious Presentation
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

[quote=“Ziege Terra 117, post:2, topic:285163”]What?[/quote]Don’t even post if you can’t comprehend the OP.

You could talk about how countries are biased for religions. For example, if you were say, Muslim and tried running for president in the US, you wouldn’t be the president.

You could also talk about how a majority of the wars in the past were due to religious differences. In which case the wars would be in vain considering everyone there would be hypocritical-- religion calls for peace. Just talk about how ironic religion is, because we try using it for everything it’s against.

And last but not least, jot a note that politics really shouldn’t be mixed with religion. Politics calls for fact, religion is based on opinion. Yet, it’s been mixed so many times before it seems as if it’s completely ignored.

Read full topic

Any ideas?[/quote]

Jewish and the non-Jewish?

item.title: Religious Presentation
item.description:
@11167 wrote:
